long_description: Put away that old picnic basket and set out on your next adventure with the insulated REI Picnic Cooler. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep your food cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. Molded-foam bottom provides excellent structure, support and waterproof protection. Exterior pockets hold utensils and napkins (sold separately); compression straps secure a picnic blanket to the front and side pockets. Padded carry handle and adjustable shoulder strap allow comfortable hauling of the REI Picnic Cooler. Packs down to 15 x 10 x 6 in. for storage.
short_description: Put away that old picnic basket and set out on your next adventure with the insulated REI Picnic Cooler.
